name: Don Seville - Bonita
additionalNotes: Imported from Nicaragua, every Don Seville Nicaraguan is 100% handmade with all natural tobacco. Blended with fine select cuban-seed Nicaraguan tobaccos, Don Seville has the same superb, unique taste usually found in the most expensive imported cigars. Don Seville Nicaraguan Handmades – designed for the cigar smoker who thought he couldn’t afford a quality, imported handmade cigar.
